Detailed Description

Function Documentation

int32_t CSL_LBIST_clearRunBISTMode ( CSL_LBIST_regMapType *  pRegMap)

Clear run BIST mode.

=========================================================================== This function clears Run BIST mode. This is done after LBIST execution is complete.

Parameters
pRegMap[IN] Pointer to LBIST register map
Returns
The CSL error code for the API. Success: CSL_PASS Fail : CSL_EFAIL
int32_t CSL_LBIST_disableIsolation ( CSL_LBIST_regMapType *  pRegMap)

Disable LBIST Isolation.

=========================================================================== This function disables LBIST isolation. This is done after LBIST is complete.

Parameters
pRegMap[IN] Pointer to LBIST register map
Returns
The CSL error code for the API. Success: CSL_PASS Fail : CSL_EFAIL
int32_t CSL_LBIST_enableIsolation ( CSL_LBIST_regMapType *  pRegMap)

Enable LBIST Isolation.

=========================================================================== This function enables LBIST isolation. Isolation needs to be enabled before starting LBIST.

Parameters
pRegMap[IN] Pointer to LBIST register map
Returns
The CSL error code for the API. Success: CSL_PASS Fail : CSL_EFAIL
int32_t CSL_LBIST_enableRunBISTMode ( CSL_LBIST_regMapType *  pRegMap)

Enable run BIST mode.

=========================================================================== This function enables Run BIST mode. This is needed to be set before starting LBIST.

Parameters
pRegMap[IN] Pointer to LBIST register map
Returns
The CSL error code for the API. Success: CSL_PASS Fail : CSL_EFAIL
int32_t CSL_LBIST_getExpectedMISR ( uint32_t *  pLBISTSig,
uint32_t *  pExpectedMISRValue 
)

LBIST get expected MISR.

=========================================================================== This function returns the expected MISR register value. This register holds the expected Multiple Input Signature generated by LBIST test.

Parameters
pLBISTSig[IN] Pointer to LBIST Sig Register
pExpectedMISRValue[OUT] Pointer to MISR value return
Returns
The CSL error code for the API. Success: CSL_PASS Fail : CSL_EFAIL
int32_t CSL_LBIST_getMISR ( CSL_LBIST_regMapType *  pRegMap,
uint32_t *  pMISRValue 
)

LBIST get MISR.

=========================================================================== This function returns the MISR register. This register holds the Multiple Input Signature generated by LBIST test.

Parameters
pRegMap[IN] Pointer to LBIST register map
pMISRValue[OUT] Pointer to MISR value return
Returns
The CSL error code for the API. Success: CSL_PASS Fail : CSL_EFAIL
int32_t CSL_LBIST_isDone ( CSL_LBIST_regMapType *  pRegMap,
Bool *  pIsDone 
)

LBIST check done.

=========================================================================== This function checks if LBIST is complete. Not that this is different from running status, which shows if the LBIST is curently running.

Parameters
pRegMap[IN] Pointer to LBIST register map
pIsDone[OUT] Pointer to variable to indicate done status CSL_TRUE : LBIST is done CSL_FALSE: LBIST is not complete
Returns
The CSL error code for the API. Success: CSL_PASS Fail : CSL_EFAIL
int32_t CSL_LBIST_isRunning ( CSL_LBIST_regMapType *  pRegMap,
Bool *  pIsRunning 
)

LBIST check running.

=========================================================================== This function checks if LBIST is running. Not that this is specifically checking if the LBIST is currently running, and this is different from done status.

Parameters
pRegMap[IN] Pointer to LBIST register map
pIsRunning[OUT] Pointer to variable to indicate running status CSL_TRUE : LBIST is running CSL_FALSE: LBIST is not running
Returns
The CSL error code for the API. Success: CSL_PASS Fail : CSL_EFAIL
int32_t CSL_LBIST_programConfig ( CSL_LBIST_regMapType *  pRegMap,
const CSL_LBIST_config_t *const  pConfig 
)

LBIST Program config.

=========================================================================== This function configures the parameters for LBIST execution.

Parameters
pRegMap[IN] Pointer to LBIST register map
pConfig[IN] Pointer to LBIST program configuration
Returns
The CSL error code for the API. Success: CSL_PASS Fail : CSL_EFAIL
int32_t CSL_LBIST_reset ( CSL_LBIST_regMapType *  pRegMap)

Reset LBIST.

=========================================================================== This function resets LBIST module. This is done preparing for a new LBIST execution.

Parameters
pRegMap[IN] Pointer to LBIST register map
Returns
The CSL error code for the API. Success: CSL_PASS Fail : CSL_EFAIL
int32_t CSL_LBIST_start ( CSL_LBIST_regMapType *  pRegMap)

LBIST start.

=========================================================================== This function starts LBIST execution.

Parameters
pRegMap[IN] Pointer to LBIST register map
Returns
The CSL error code for the API. Success: CSL_PASS Fail : CSL_EFAIL
int32_t CSL_LBIST_stop ( CSL_LBIST_regMapType *  pRegMap)

LBIST stop.

=========================================================================== This function stops LBIST execution. This is normally called after checking the signature and clearing the run-BIST mode. But this can also be called asynchronously to stop LBIST in the middle of a test.

Parameters
pRegMap[IN] Pointer to LBIST register map
Returns
The CSL error code for the API. Success: CSL_PASS Fail : CSL_EFAIL
